translation: Let him firmly hold his body, head, and neck erect and still, gazing at the tip of his nose without looking around.
commentary: 6.13 Equal erect? body head and neck body? head and neck? holding holding? Unmovable still? Steady: steady? Perspective,gazing at? tip of the nose? Svam ones own? Directions: directions? f and? Anavalokayan not looking.Commentary The Lord describes here the pose or Asana and the Drishti (gaze) in this verse.You cannot practice meditation without a firm seat.
